distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for rubygem-activesupport-5_1 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-27777: Fixed cross-site scripting vulnerability in Action View tag helper (bsc#1199060).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A XSS Vulnerability in Action View tag helpers >= 5.2.0 and < 5.2.0 which would allow an attacker to inject content if able to control input into specific attributes.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
